basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Robert Delano Endowed Scholarship in Occupational Safety
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Robert Delano Endowed Scholarship in Oc

description: To provide scholarship assistance to students majoring in Industrial or Occupational Safety. Eligibility Requirements Declared major in good standing at UCO in the Occupational Safety Program Active and engaged member of the UCO Student Chapter of the ASSP Applying as a junior, priority will be given to a senior student who has met the criteria Two professional letters of recommendation Essay detailing financial need and appreciation of the mission, history, and importance of ASSP Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Occupational Safety
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Occupational Safety
